Class TransMsgLine

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.TransMsgLine
All Implemented Interfaces:
SonarObject, MsgLine
public class TransMsgLine extends Object implements MsgLine
Transient message line implementation.
Author:
Douglas Lau
